data.name: OnecoinEngineer FC Volume 2
data.detailed_description:
The manner of the game development in Unity is told.
It becomes real in UI and the application which can study a programming by using the forest crash released by AppStore and GooglePlayStore as a base material.

The dictionary function and the study application which also has the quiz function.

1. A section is being separated every screen.
2. The setting which is each function such as Text, Image and Button every screen, it's explained by the character while showing a screen.
3. Each used function can be read by a dictionary.
4. It's possible to review the contents learned by help panel and a dictionary by a quiz.

Target
* The person who would like to learn a program
* The person who would like to make a game

Sales item
* I limit the function and when an item at 500 JPyen is bought, the function is released completely for 30 days.

data.short_description: Easy to understand and easy to learn game programs ◆ Forest Crush I will teach you how to make an actual released app, Forest Crush as a subject. You can learn everything from the start screen to completion while showing the screen of Unity

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1 / 10 / 11
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13以降
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
